Name: NIMH-CompyPsych MMI
Acknowledgements: Preparation of this dataset for sharing used the computational resources of the NIH HPC (high-performance computing) Biowulf cluster (http://hpc.nih.gov).
Funding: National Institute of Mental Health Grant ZIA-MH002957-01 to AS
ReferencesAndLinks: Keren H., Zheng C., Jangraw D.C., Chang K., Vitale A., Rutledge R.B., Pereira F., Nielson D.M., Stringaris A. (2021). The temporal representation of experience in subjective mood. eLife, 2021;10:e62051, DOI: 10.7554/eLife.62051
EthicsApprovals: All participants in this study were enrolled in the Characterization and Treatment of Adolescent Depression study approved by the NIH IRB under protocol number 18-M-0037.
